mapper.insert:
insert into site_block_rule
description,
site_id,
http_status,
check_type, keywords, page_result_type,
enable_status,
create_time
values
#{description},
#{siteId},
#{httpStatus},
#{checkType}, #{keywords}, #{pageResultType},
#{enableStatus},
current_timestamp
mapper.delete:
delete from site_block_rule where id in
#{item},
mapper.update:
update site_block_rule t
t.description = #{description},
t.site_id = #{siteId},
t.http_status = #{httpStatus},
t.check_type = #{checkType},
t.keywords = #{keywords},
t.page_result_type = #{pageResultType},
t.enable_status = #{enableStatus},
t.id = #{id}
t.id = #{id}
mapper.select:
select t.id, t.description, t.site_id, t.http_status, t.check_type, t.keywords, t.page_result_type, t.enable_status, t.create_time from site_block_rule t
t.id = #{id}

select t.id, t.description, t.site_id, t.http_status, t.check_type, t.keywords, t.page_result_type, t.enable_status, t.create_time, t1.name as site_name, t2.label as http_status_label, t3.label as check_type_label, t4.label as page_result_type_label, t5.label as enable_status_label from site_block_rule t left join site t1 on t.site_id = t1.id left join dictionary t2 on t.http_status = t2.value and t2.type = 'httpStatus' left join dictionary t3 on t.check_type = t3.value and t3.type = 'checkType' left join dictionary t4 on t.page_result_type = t4.value and t4.type = 'pageResultType' left join dictionary t5 on t.enable_status = t5.value and t5.type = 'enableStatus'
t.id = #{id}
